presentationTable.name: Facts - Pre-Active Enrollments
presentationTable.description: This folder provides metrics related to learner's enrollment to various learning items prior to becoming an active enrollment.

presentationColumns.name: Number of Enrollments Requested
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of enrollments that are in requested status

presentationColumns.name: Number of Enrollments Request Rejected
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of enrollments requests that are in rejected status

presentationColumns.name: Number of Enrollments Pending Prerequisite

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Enrollments Pending Fulfilment

presentationColumns.name: Number of Non-Catalog Items Enrollment
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of Enrollments by learners to non-catalog items
